1517760.name: RPG Maker MV - KR Elemental Dungeon Tileset - Dark Light Lightning Metal
1517760.description:
Bring the power of the elements to your RPG Maker game with KR Elemental Dungeon Tiles, featuring dark, light, lightning and metal elements!

Need a place to hide your magical world-saving crystals? A lair for your villains or mystical creatures? Or just looking for something a little different? This set of four elements has a wide variety of tiles, including extra-large statues and unique pieces.

Includes:

* TileA1 sheet with water, lava, and poison
* TileA2 x 4 sheets (one for each element) which includes multiple ground types, cracks, crystal autotiles and more (depending on element)
* A4 with 18 walls (4 brick colors, 3 in bismuth pattern, 2 dark, 2 light, 4 lightning, 2 metal, 1 concrete)
* B-E Sheets with hand-drawn: pillars, massive dragon head statues, torches and crystals , magic rings, bridges, doors, windows, thrones for your villain

** Please note there is some content in this pack that is similar or identical to KR Elemental Dungeon Tileset - Fire Water Earth Wind, KR Elemental Dungeon Tileset - Celestial Flora Ice Time (Tile A4 - Concrete wall, black stone wall is same, Tile B - four pillars or torch bases are the same, the snakes have slightly different colored eyes, Tile C - Ornate platforms + stairs at upper left are the same)

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1517760.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
